name: Day and Zimmermann, Inc., Appellant, v. Blocked Iron Corporation of America
name_abbreviation: Day & Zimmermann, Inc. v. Blocked Iron Corp. of America

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones,' Cohen and Bok, JJ.
parties: Day and Zimmermann, Inc., Appellant, v. Blocked Iron Corporation of America.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the lower court striking off plaintiff’s lien is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Waters which is reported in 15 Pa. D. & C. 2d 251.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Lewis E. YanDusen, Jr., with him Robert 8. Ryan, and Drinker, Biddle & Reath, for appellant.
E. Francis DeLone, with him W. Thomas Berriman, and Barnes, Dechert, Price, Myers & Rhoads, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Day and Zimmermann, Inc., Appellant, v. Blocked Iron Corporation of America.
Argued November 19, 1958.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones,' Cohen and Bok, JJ.
Lewis E. YanDusen, Jr., with him Robert 8. Ryan, and Drinker, Biddle & Reath, for appellant.
E. Francis DeLone, with him W. Thomas Berriman, and Barnes, Dechert, Price, Myers & Rhoads, for appellee.
January 12, 1959:
